author: ryanleeschneider
content: Possibly related to ^ this inscription spam but are the goerli bootnodes online?  I just restarted a couple nodes and they seem to be really struggling to find peers (nodes that've been running for awhile seem to have plenty)

author: parithosh
content: hmm they should be, we just synced like 300 goerli nodes over the last ~3days. The 300 nodes are synced and now offline to prep for the shadowfork though, so perhaps that churn in peers is leading to some downtime?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Seems like my CLs had an issue and that was my main issue, though I can confirm that these nodes are still taking quite awhile to find EL peers (they each only have a handful of peers so far)
